title: e-Medsys EHR
description:
TriMed is a leader in the development and implementation of software necessary for physician practices to fully thrive. Our advanced e-Medsys Suite of Practice Management and fully integrated Electronic Health Record (EHR) software comes equipped with all the tools necessary for succeeding in an era that has come to be characterized as that of “Meaningful Use”.
The e-Medsys solutions are easy to use while being robust and flexible enough to meet the demands of enterprises large and small – from the front desk all the way through an office to physician input and interaction and everywhere in between.
